trans-unit.source: Adding Information to Records to Yourself | Microsoft Docs

seg-source.mrk: Adding Information to Records to Yourself | Microsoft Docs

target.mrk: Přidávání informací do záznamů pro sebe | Microsoft Docs

trans-unit.source: Attach a note to any record in the application.

seg-source.mrk: Attach a note to any record in the application.

target.mrk: Připojte oznámení k libovolnému záznamu v aplikaci.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have extra information about a sales order that does not fit in any of the fields on the sales order, you can write a note.

seg-source.mrk: For example, if you have extra information about a sales order that does not fit in any of the fields on the sales order, you can write a note.

target.mrk: Máte-li například další informace o prodejní objednávce, které se nehodí do žádného z polí v prodejní objednávce, můžete napsat oznámení.

trans-unit.source: Adding and Viewing Notes on Records

seg-source.mrk: Adding and Viewing Notes on Records

target.mrk: Přidávání oznámení k záznamům a jejich prohlížení

trans-unit.source: You <!--OnPrem and your colleagues -->can add notes to records in the application.

seg-source.mrk: You <!--OnPrem and your colleagues -->can add notes to records in the application.

target.mrk: Do záznamů v aplikaci můžete <!--OnPrem and your colleagues --> přidávat oznámení.

trans-unit.source: Many pages, particularly those pages that display a list of records (such as the **Sales Orders** page) or details about a specific record (such as the **Sales Order** page) include the **Notes** action or **Notes** FactBox.

seg-source.mrk: Many pages, particularly those pages that display a list of records (such as the **Sales Orders** page) or details about a specific record (such as the **Sales Order** page) include the **Notes** action or **Notes** FactBox.

target.mrk: Mnoho stránek, zejména ty stránky, které zobrazují seznam záznamů (například stránka **Prodejní objednávky**) nebo podrobnosti o konkrétním záznamu (například stránka **Prodejní objednávka**), zahrnují akci **Oznámení** nebo okno s fakty **Oznámení**.

trans-unit.source: **Notes** is where you can write notes about a record to yourself<!--OnPrem or others, and where you can view notes to you from others. For example, a note could be a general comment or processing instruction to your colleague, who can then respond to your note using their own **Notes**. Or, your colleague can add a note that gives you extra information about a sales order that is not covered by the information on the sales order. These notes and correspondences will follow the record as it is processed in the company.-->

seg-source.mrk: **Notes** is where you can write notes about a record to yourself
seg-source.ph: <!--OnPrem or others, and where you can view notes to you from others. For example, a note could be a general comment or processing instruction to your colleague, who can then respond to your note using their own **Notes**. Or, your colleague can add a note that gives you extra information about a sales order that is not covered by the information on the sales order. These notes and correspondences will follow the record as it is processed in the company.-->

target.mrk: **Oznámení** umožňují psát poznámky o záznamu pro sebe
target.ph: <!--OnPrem or others, and where you can view notes to you from others. For example, a note could be a general comment or processing instruction to your colleague, who can then respond to your note using their own **Notes**. Or, your colleague can add a note that gives you extra information about a sales order that is not covered by the information on the sales order. These notes and correspondences will follow the record as it is processed in the company.-->

trans-unit.source: To work with notes on a record

seg-source.mrk: To work with notes on a record

trans-unit.source: Open the record list page or record page (for example, the **Sales Orders** or **Sale Order** page).

seg-source.mrk: Open the record list page or record page (for example, the **Sales Orders** or **Sale Order** page).

target.mrk: Otevřete stránku seznamu záznamů nebo stránku záznamu (například stránku **Prodejní objednávky** nebo **Prodejní objednávka**).

trans-unit.source: Choose the **Notes** action to open the **Notes** window.

seg-source.mrk: Choose the **Notes** action to open the **Notes** window.

trans-unit.source: This window displays any current notes on the record.

seg-source.mrk: This window displays any current notes on the record.

target.mrk: Toto okno zobrazuje všechny aktuální oznámení v záznamu.

trans-unit.source: From here, you can do the following:

seg-source.mrk: From here, you can do the following:

trans-unit.source: To view or edit the note, choose **...** and then **Edit**.

seg-source.mrk: To view or edit the note, choose **...** and then **Edit**.

target.mrk: Chcete-li oznámení zobrazit nebo upravit, zvolte **...** a poté **Upravit**.

trans-unit.source: You can also do this from the **Notes** FactBox if it available on the page.

seg-source.mrk: You can also do this from the **Notes** FactBox if it available on the page.

target.mrk: To lze také provést z okna s fakty **Oznámení** pokud je k dispozici na stránce.

trans-unit.source: To add or note, choose **+new**, and the ype your message in the **Note** box.

seg-source.mrk: To add or note, choose **+new**, and the ype your message in the **Note** box.

target.mrk: Chcete-li přidat oznámení, vyberte **+Nový** a do pole **oznámení** zadejte svou zprávu.

trans-unit.source: You can enter a maximum of 30 lines of text in the note.

seg-source.mrk: You can enter a maximum of 30 lines of text in the note.

target.mrk: Do poznámky můžete zadat maximálně 30 řádků textu.
